Onyeka Ibe (amụrụ na Septemba 29, 1971) bụ onye amụrụ na Naijiria nke bụkwa onye America na-ese ihe. O nwetara ihe ịga nke ọma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na isii mgbe mbụ o gosipụtara ọrụ ya na National Gallery of Modern Art, Lagos A kọwara ya dị ka otu n'ime ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na-akpali akpali nke si na Sub-Saharan Africa pụta kemgbe afọ 1990, e nyere ya "The Best SOLO Artist of the Year 2006" na International Artexpo New York
N'ọnwa Julaị afọ 2007, Art Business News kọwara ma kpọọ ya dịka otu n'ime "Today's Top Artist". Ibe nwetara nzere bachelọ nke Fine Arts na Mahadum Benin, Nigeria.

A mụrụ ya n'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe agha obodo Naịjirịa biri ma o tolitere na ọchịchị onye kwuo uche ya na-emepe emepe nke a kwụsịrị na mberede. Ọ kọwara nna ya dị ka onye nwere mmetụta dị ukwuu, onye gbara ya ume ịchụso nka site na nwata
Ọrụ Pablo Picasso na Jackson Pollock metụtara ụdị nka ya na usoro ya.
